title: ONE MONTH FREE--SWIMMING POOL----RENT AMORTIZED--WASHER / DRYER
posting_body: ['ONE MONTH FREE--SWIMMING POOL----RENT AMORTIZED--WASHER / DRYER', 'Listing ID #: 212881', 'Price: $3,300', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Business Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Concierge', 'Diplomats OK', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Pool', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'High Ceilings', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'Washer', 'Flex one bedrooms apartment -Feature washer & dryer as well as wide strip wood oak flooring, white marble kitchen counters with ultra modern light rift oak cabinetry and ultra modern bathrooms tiles!', 'This building features an elegant entry with 25 foot ceilings, hanging chandeliers and a book shelve library wall!', 'The finishes and color tones are the perfect natural combination of browns, grays, marbles, and oak offering a sophisticated chic finish.', 'All building amenities are situated on the roof including a 50 Foot Swimming pool with phenomenal views of the East River.', 'The amenities level includes a resident lounge, and fitness center.', 'Located in the heart of the new Lower Manhattan.', 'Just beyond the lobby is the vibrancy and charm of the South Street Seaport and Financial District.', 'Meandering cobblestone streets, hidden parks, eclectic shops and notable restaurants invite you to explore Manhattan’s most exciting neighborhood.', 'With close proximity to Tribeca, World Trade Center, Brookfield Place and all major subway lines, only 4 minutes away, residents have easy access to the rest of the city.', 'AMENITIES and services usually reserved for the most desirable properties.', 'A dramatic 18’ lobby with striking fireplace, 24-hour concierge, and valet service set the scene for a warm welcome home.', 'The beautiful rooftop pool is the ultimate luxury amenity - a great place to socialize, unwind and cool off.', 'The residents lounge, reservable entertaining kitchen and dining room, gaming area, Techno-Gym outfitted fitness center and yoga studio feature panoramic views of lower Manhattan and beyond.', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE 917-353-3448 EMAIL', '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
